refbodydiv.section: pubmapMaprefDomain defines references to submaps from within maps that integrate the pubmapDomain. In particular, it allows publication component specific maps that are specializations of pubmap.

This domain provides references for the following:
Element name: appendix-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/appendix pubmapMapref-d/appendix-mapref
Element name: appendixes-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/appendixes pubmapMapref-d/appendixes-mapref
Element name: article-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/article pubmapMapref-d/article-mapref
Element name: backmatter-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/backmatter pubmapMapref-d/backmatter-mapref
Element name: bibliolist-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/bibliolist pubmapMapref-d/bibliolist-mapref
Element name: chapter-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/chapter pubmapMapref-d/chapter-mapref
Element name: department-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/department pubmapMapref-d/department-mapref
Element name: frontmatter-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/frontmatter pubmapMapref-d/frontmatter-mapref
Element name: glossary-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/glossary pubmapMapref-d/glossary-mapref
Element name: glossary-group-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/glossary pubmapMapref-d/glossary-group-mapref
Element name: keydefs-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/keydefs pubmapMapref-d/keydefs-mapref
Element name: keydef-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/keydef pubmapMapref-d/keydef-mapref
Element name: part-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/part pubmapMapref-d/part-mapref
Element name: partsection-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/partsection pubmapMapref-d/partsection-mapref
Element name: pubbody-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/pubbody pubmapMapref-d/pubbody-mapref
Element name: publication-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/publication pubmapMapref-d/publication-mapref
Element name: sidebar-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/sidebar pubmapMapref-d/sidebar-mapref
Element name: subsection-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/subsection pubmapMapref-d/subsection-mapref
Element name: wrap-cover-mapref; inheritance: + map/topicref pubmap-d/wrap pubmapMapref-d/wrap-cover-mapref
